From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia




2022 Indian filmIshq PashminaDirected byArvind PandeyWritten byArvind PandeyProduced bySuraj Surya Mishra and Shalu MishraStarringBhavin Bhanushali Malti ChaharZarina WahabCinematographyNavin V MishraEdited byRajesh G PandeyMusic bySham-Balkar, Shashwat Prakhar Bhardwaj & Arvind PandeyProductioncompanyKRISHNA SHANTI PRODUCTIONRelease date
23 September 2022 (2022-09-23)
CountryIndiaLanguageHindi
Ishq Pashmina is a 2022 Indian Hindi-language romantic drama film written and directed by Arvind Pandey and produced by Krishna Shanti Production, starring  Bhavin Bhanushali, Malti Chahar and Zarina Wahab.[1][2][3] This film marks the acting debut of Deepak Chahar's sister Malti.[4]


Plot[edit]
In the serene and picturesque setting of Mashobra, Karan and Omisha find themselves drawn together by their circumstances. Their connection is unique; one has only ever felt the presence of the other, never seen. As they grow closer, they become perfect complements to each other. Yet, their destiny might hold a different story. Amidst a backdrop of intense snowfall, a delicate and profound tale unfolds, one that resonates deeply and leaves a lasting impact on the heart.[5]

Cast[edit]
Bhavin Bhanushali as Karan[6]
Malti Chahar as Omisha[7]
Zarina Wahab as Karan's mother[8]
Brijendra Kala[9]
Kainaat Arora[10]
Gaurika Mishra
Vijay Mishra
Yash Chaurasia
Vikram Sharma
Ashna Soni
Reception[edit]
A critic from The Times of India wrote that "While Bhavin as Karan delivers an average performance at best, it’s Malti’s performance that carries some semblance of sincerity. This love story is jaded and banal".[11]  A review at Film Information, while praising mildly the acting, also criticised the plot, and dialogue and direction  too.[12]

^ "Cricketer Deepak Chahar's sister Malti to make debut with 'Ishq Pashmina'". The Times of India. IANS. 21 May 2022. Retrieved 13 November 2022.

^ "Bhavin Bhanushali: We will be shooting 'Ishq Pashmina' in Himachal Pradesh". Mid-day. 25 January 2022. Retrieved 18 September 2022.

^ "कृष्णा शांति प्रोडक्शन ने फ़िल्म 'इश्क़ पशमीना' का मोशन पोस्टर किया लॉन्च". NDTVIndia. Retrieved 18 September 2022.

^ "Cricketer Deepak Chahar's sister Malti to make debut with 'Ishq Pashima'". IANS. 21 May 2022 – via The Times of India.

^ Bharatvarsh, TV9 (21 May 2022). "'इश्क पश्मीना' में नजर आएंगे भाविन भानुशाली और मालती चाहर, अहम किरदार में होंगी जरीना वहाब". TV9 Bharatvarsh (in Hindi). Retrieved 14 January 2024.{{cite web}}:  CS1 maint: numeric names: authors list (link)

^ "Bhavin Bhanushali: Blessed with options to be selective". Hindustan Times. 19 August 2022. Retrieved 19 September 2022.

^ "Malti Chahar: बॉलीवुड में अपना जलवा दिखाएंगी आईपीएल की यह मिस्ट्री गर्ल, इस स्टार संग बुनेंगी 'इश्क पश्मीना'". Amar Ujala (in Hindi). Retrieved 19 September 2022.

^ "बॉलीवुड में एंट्री करने जा रही हैं क्रिकेटर दीपक चाहर की बहन मालती, देखें तस्वीरें". Dainik Jagran (in Hindi). Retrieved 19 September 2022.

^ "'इश्क पश्मीना' में नजर आएंगे भाविन भानुशाली और मालती चाहर, अहम किरदार में होंगी जरीना वहाब". TV9 Bharatvarsh (in Hindi). 21 May 2022. Retrieved 19 September 2022.

^ "कृष्णा शांति प्रोडक्शन ने फ़िल्म 'इश्क़ पशमीना' का मोशन पोस्टर किया लॉन्च". NDTVIndia. Retrieved 19 September 2022.

^ Srivastava, Abhisehk. "Ishq Pashmina Movie Review : This clichéd and banal love story would have worked in the 70s". The Times of India.

^ "'ISHQ PASHMINA' REVIEW | 23 September, 2022 – Film Information". 23 September 2022. Retrieved 12 September 2023.
